name: Coast
headline: Solution Gateway for API-First Companies
description:
Coast transforms APIs into business value. Product-led teams use Coast to build interactive user journeys powered by one or multiple APIs, creating fully functional web apps with live API connectivity.

Our visual platform makes APIs more accessible and accelerates commercialization, enabling high-impact digital transformation for the world‚Äôs largest enterprises.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:sales-enablement; industry:api; location:new-york

What we do
# Turn cURL requests into dynamic UIs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe653b81ffbc335ed1a258_Screen%20Shot%202022-08-18%20at%2012.13.38%20PM.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe67a68b94462071fcca85_Screen%20Shot%202022-08-18%20at%2012.23.43%20PM.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe6718f8ef6a6332741449_Screen%20Shot%202022-08-18%20at%2012.21.12%20PM.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe6623bf7f1222568ad80c_Screen%20Shot%202022-08-18%20at%2012.17.10%20PM.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe66a8567d2b09ffe382c9_Screen%20Shot%202022-08-18%20at%2012.19.24%20PM.png)
# On-demand personalization with unique links for every prospect
# No-code admin dashboard
Spend more time demoing and less time setting up. Easily create, edit and track the success of all your demos from one place.
# Instant link generation
Spin up custom links in a matter of clicks because each prospect deserves their own personalized demo environment‚Äîthat's how deals are won.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/642d905262436e2e090a06c2_Screenshot%202023-04-05%20at%2011.14.16%20AM.png)
# Personalized Visuals
Make your prospects feel right at home with personalized UI, showing what your tech can actually power for _their_ business‚Ä¶not Acme, Inc.
# ... and Personalized Content
Quickly edit text and content per prospect to ensure they're seeing what they care about to get the deal across the finish line.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/642d90e098d7cc4eb6c991b2_Screenshot%202023-04-05%20at%2011.16.21%20AM.png)
# Fully-integrated, supercharged environments for prospects to see your API in action
# Live integration environments
Every demo environment comes supercharged with your API already integrated, giving prospects the ability to interact with real workflows in seconds.
# Unlock a quick win
Get your prospect to their first win in a matter of seconds. Your champion shouldn‚Äôt have to convince a developer to dedicate precious engineering resources before knowing how your solution works.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fff240a23f22b045fe85d8_ezgif.com-gif-maker%20\(6\).gif)
# The API demo you've dreamed about ‚Äî without the dev time

Our special sauce
# Everything you need, baked-in by default
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe559e54fbe1ccd10a0c13_brush-dynamic-clay-min.png)
No-code tooling
Help your sales team own the customer journey eliminating dependency on other teams.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe55ede1d4e9e743c4ed0b_camera-dynamic-clay-min.png)
Local database
Every Coast instance automatically spins up a local database so that the choices a user makes sticks with them throughout their experience.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe563f76f8983d97e08d9f_flash-dynamic-clay-min.png)
Supercharged env
Coast is ready to handle all the complexity of your API - from custom auth, to background requests, to conditional rendering, and much, much more!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe55f4f1f4ccaad23595de_chart-dynamic-clay-min.png)
Embedded analytics
Get live insights on how and when prospects interact with your demo to qualify leads and contact them when you‚Äôre on their mind.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe55bf57b9ed19b24d033b_phone-outgoing-dynamic-clay-min.png)
Ready for all audiences
Selling to technical decision makers? Go under the hood and look at the code. Execs, BizOps or PMs? Flip the switch to access a visual wrapper.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe562a954f0f5e22ce6605_crown-dynamic-clay-min.png)
Connect to prod
Let prospects execute real requests with their own data to create unforgettable experiences.
# Use Coast throughout the sales cycle ‚Äî from lead to live
Live demos & sales calls
No more flipping through endpoints or pulling up Postman‚Äîfeel confident presenting demos that standout. Finally answer the question, ‚ÄúCan I see a demo?‚Äù with confidence!
Onboarding & activation
Getting a signed deal is just step one... now you have to get them live! Send prospects materials that will best support them in getting live to supercharge activation and bring in more revenue.
The perfect leave-behind
Help your champions take something back to their team that will put your best foot forward. It‚Äôs now easy to follow up with personalized materials instead of links to documentation. Use Coast as the perfect piece of collateral to travel throughout their team.
Cold outreach, recapture churn
Boost cold email responses by showing upfront value to prospects, and re-engaging prospects stuck in the funnel.
On our soapbox
# Still sending those stale API docs that everyone definitely reads?
Look, we don't blame _you_. You didn't have any better tools, so you reached for the good 'ol reliable technical docs. Or maybe, you spent hours crafting that 30 page sales deck, which you know is a lot to chew on ü§¢.But here's the issue, you need that BizOps rep who you just had a great conversation with to go pitch their boss, who pitches their boss's boss, and their boss's boss's boss. And you just gave your champion what... API docs and call notes? This is starting to sound more like a homework assignment üìñ.
# Out with the old, in with the new
It‚Äôs time to send your soldier into battle with a proposal that will move the needle. Something that is personal, interactive and **beautiful**. Give your prospects the opportunity to test drive your API in that brand new 2022 Ferrari üèéÔ∏è and maybe, just maybe it‚Äôs time to retire Grandpa‚Äôs ‚Äô86 pickup truck üîß that‚Äôs been dusting away in the garage.Whether you want to personalize outbound, give stunning demos live or leave your champion with a lasting, tangible impression, try Coast and watch your conversion rate soar ü¶Ö.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62f80fdafd7b9942e93f3273/62fe5e1ee77b84e1b0d50b77_Untitled%20design.png)
Wall of Love

generated_description:
Coast is a dynamic startup launched in 2022, hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S21 and based in New York City. With a lean team of 14, Coast serves as a crucial solution provider for API-first companies, focusing on transforming APIs into direct business value. Their mission? To empower product-led teams to craft interactive user journeys that harness the full potential of their APIs.

Imagine selling more than just documentation‚Äîimagine providing a live demonstration of what an API can accomplish. That‚Äôs what Coast does. They equip companies with a visually appealing platform that simplifies the process of commercializing APIs, driving meaningful digital transformation for some of the largest enterprises globally.

The company's unique approach allows users to generate customized, interactive demos without needing extensive coding knowledge. Think of it as giving every prospect a test drive‚Äîa bespoke demo that showcases exactly how an API can work for their specific needs. Coast‚Äôs no-code admin dashboard and instant link generation features mean sales teams can focus on building relationships rather than getting bogged down in technical setups.

Coast's features empower businesses to stand out in their outreach, collapse sales cycles, and enhance activation times, all while bringing clarity to complex API integrations. Their platform turns mundane cURL requests into dynamic UIs and offers embedded analytics to gauge prospect engagement in real-time, making Coast not just a tool but a crucial asset in the sales toolkit.

The buzz is already palpable, with endorsements from happy customers like Martine Katz at Unit and Calvin French-Owen from Segment. They both emphasize how Coast's personalized demos significantly cut down the time needed to convey product value to customers, which is a game changer for API-centric sales.

Coast is positioned under tags like 'SaaS', 'B2B', and 'sales enablement', indicating their commitment to enhancing the sales experience in the digital realm. Whether you‚Äôre aiming to engage potential clients or streamline your sales pipeline, Coast serves as a robust ally in making API engagement beautiful and effective.

For more information or to see Coast in action, you can visit their website at [trycoast.com](https://trycoast.com).
